message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper deals with machine learning problems and efficient algorithms for exploration and optimization. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves geometric concepts and algorithms, which suggests the category cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The use of optimization techniques and regret analysis points towards cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with bandit problems, which are often studied in the category cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
